GLU.comment1: !!! use gigantic Diff to compare the asymptote of GLU 'point + on-off' with Ca2+ 'point + static'
GLU.comment2: !!! use the same Diff to compare the decay dynamics of GLU 'point + on-off' with Ca2+ 'point + spike'

The name for this species shown in the u.ionMechName: The ion mechanism name for this species (ending with '_ion'). Only 'na_ion' and 'k_ion' are defined in NEURON by default. All others are custom MOD- or HOC-based mechanisms.
The name for this species shown in the u.baseOuterConc (mM): The base concentration outside the cell. It is used as a default value assigned to the GLOBAL var named '{name}o0_{name}_ion'.
The name for this species shown in the u.Diff (um2/ms): The diffusion coefficient in the extracellular space. It is used only in 'point + on-off' and 'point + spike' diffusion models.
The name for this species shown in the u.baseInnerConc (mM): Like the 'Outer' var, but inside the cell, and the GLOBAL var is named '{name}i0_{name}_ion'.
